extendedInfo.description: Get discounts, save money and support Orlandoâs businesses with Buy Local Orlando. The Buy Local Orlando phone app allows you to:Â·         Search database of more than 500 participating businessesÂ·         Take advantage of discounts and special offers at businesses near youÂ·         Check-in to your favorite businessesÂ·         Share with your friends on Facebook and TwitterÂ·         Receive instant notification of newly-added businesses and offers As part of Orlando Mayor Buddy Dyer's Strengthen Orlando initiative and the City's overall strategy for economic growth, the goal of Buy Local Orlando is to connect businesses in Orlando with the buying power of our residents to promote a thriving, economically viable, close-knit community. Unlike other discount programs, all Buy Local Orlando vendors are certified City of Orlando businesses and receive 100% of revenue generated from sales through the program - so you can rest assured that the money you spend with them directly contributes to our local economy. Please visit buylocalorlando.com for more information.

reviews.title: Next Version Suggestion
reviews.comment: Love it! I just have a suggestion for the next version--ability to share on LinkedIn.  Thanks! And, Good Luck!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buy local Orlando
reviews.comment: Went to a few merchants and tried the app they are not in the program anymore but still honored the coupon, filtering is glitchy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UI is bad
reviews.comment: Crashes while using the search. The UI is too small on my phone. Google maps doesn\'t work. It just appears as a grid, no map.
reviews.author: A Google User
